name: Portal 2D
description:
Welcome to Portal 2D!

Portal is a game developed by Valve, but i have recreated it in 2D with Construct 2! This game is filled with puzzles to solve and fun levels to play! (and due to the limits in Construct 2D you unfortunately cannot make your own portals!)

Original game by Valve Corporation. © Valve Corporation, 2007.

Product Features

  • Extensive single player: Has a total of 12 levels to master!
  • Made with Construct 2! This is more than just a 2D game...
  • Music included!
  • The game you love, remade!: The original Portal 1 by Valve was named 2007's Game of the Year by over 30 publications worldwide!
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    Just a browser with HTML Support.
    RECOMMENDED:
    A FCKIN BROWSER WITH HTML SUPPORT!!

DISCLAMER:

This is the first game i've ever made, bugs may occur and it's extremely shitty.
